1.0.name: wordpress/compactrss
1.0.description:
This plug-in makes it possible to exclude certain parts of your posts in your feeds. It uses the filterhooks the_content (in combination with is_feed()) and the_content_rss.

You have several options to determine what must be excluded; you can hide everything after the More-tag and/or hide everything between <!--crss--> and <!--/crss--> Since update 1.1 you may use multiple CRSS-tags in a post.
